name: authication-in-mern
description: *   **Definition**: The process of verifying the identity of a user or system. *   **Goal**: To answer the question "Who are you?". *   **In this Project**: Users prove their identity by providing an email and password. *   **Method**: We use **Bcrypt** to verify passwords and issue a **JWT** (JSON Web Token) upon success.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run start --prefix backend
